TopicTitle: Space plane builder camera controls in rocket builder mode

Articles.Content: This is a feature I would love to have: Space plane builder camera controls in rocket builder mode. I'm frequently holding shift and holding the right mouse button trying to pan the camera in rocket builder mode only to be reminded that is only available in the space plane hangar.

The controls are all still there -- they're just switched around a bit across the editors, since one's vertical and one's horizontal

I think the pan control in the VAB is middle-mouse click and drag
Well, how about unifying the controls so they work the same in both?
